title: Great to see Riot's view on youtube theft.
body:
So basically yesterday and for a few days there have been several posts made on behalf of a youtube account, by a level 1 account for league content, but all of it has been stolen.

As is obvious i reported it, and put a message on it saying it was stolen (and notified one of the youtubers that had been stolen from.)

And of course, that post hasn't been deleted or anything like that, in fact for me personally of the 3 videos i have been on 2 of them directly linked me to the person it was stolen off.

Honestly, this is just a terrible showing of riot, i know that i had reported it and made a post 21 hours ago, the post had been up for 23, so it's not like no one at riot has not seen it.

This just makes me not want to actually make an effort to make youtube content (and i have been trying to set up my computer for it for a while.) as their is no point if it's just liable to be stolen like this and not have anyone even try to stop it like they should.

replies.body: I have personally had a entire channel shut down coz they were stealing and voicing over AngryHoneyBadgers work..i reported it and then linked it to AHB on his facebook...it took about 7 hours
